org.jivesoftware.openfire.event
Class UserEventAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.jivesoftware.openfire.event.UserEventAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserEventListener
public class UserEventAdapter
extends Object
implements UserEventListener

An abstract adapter class for receiving user events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.
